name: Reckless River Tubing
description:
Use your mouse to help guide little Timmy through his reckless river tubing adventure. Weave past rocks and crocodiles to collect coins along the way.

Controls:
  • Mouse to move
  • M to toggle mute
Credits:
  • 1-Bit Pack by Kenney.nl
  • Kenney Fonts by Kenney.nl
  • Cartoon - Slurp! by Breviceps
  • Marine diesel engine by AugustSandberg
  • Crank by misato
  • Thud by OtisJames
  • Metalic Ching by michael_grinnell
  • Balloon-Burst-02 by Gniffelbaf
Software:
  • Godot
  • Aseprite

Made for Miz Jam 1
